page.title: 05CONVENIENCE FOODS
page.content: TODAY, MANY MOTHERS HAVE TO WORK ALL DAY AND ARE NOT ABLE TO SPEND MUCH OF THEIR TIME PREPARING MEALS AND DOING A LOT OF COOKING.MEALS TEND TO BE MADE FROM FOOD WHICH IS READY PREPARED OR COOKED AND THEN DEEP FROZEN.THIS IS CALLED CONVENIENCE FOOD.MANY PEOPLE HAVE BOUGHT DEEP FREEZERS WHICH HOLD A LOT OF FOOD AND CAN BE KEPT FROZEN FOR MANY MONTHS.HOWEVER, YOU MUST PLAN YOUR MEALS IN ADVANCE BECAUSE THE FOOD CAN TAKE SEVERAL HOURS OR EVEN DAYS TO DEFROST READY FOR COOKING.A NEW TYPE OF COOKER CALLED A MICROWAVE OVEN IS OFTEN USED TO DEFROST FOOD AND COOK IT QUICKLY. IT CAN DO IT IN MINUTES RATHER THAN HOURS. CONVENIENCE FOODS ARE VERY USEFUL FOR OWNERS OF CAFES OR SMALL HOTELS WHERE THEY DO NOT HAVE REGULAR MEALS TO PREPARE. I STILL PREFER FRESH FOOD.
